title: Tyrese Gibson and Rev Run: Meet the Authors
itunes:author: iBooks
itunes:subtitle: Tyrese Gibson, actor and multiplatinum R&B singer, and Rev Run, a founding member of pioneering hip-hop group Run-DMC, talk about their book, "Manology: Secrets of Your Man’s Mind Revealed."
